structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts

law.catch_line: Waiver Of Appeal; Submission To Arbitration
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 19. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] After claiming such appeal, the parties may waive it and submit the claim to arbitrators agreed on by the parties and appointed by the probate court, and thereupon the appeal shall not be entered. The award of such arbitrators, if accepted by the court, shall be as conclusive as a judgment at law.
